attributes.action: pass  a  law  giving  police  and courts the power  to  jail  any  youth  or adult who  carry  knives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We  must be  hard  on  these yobs   who  think  they  can  get  away with  murder, lets  see  some  common  sense. This  must happen  to  anyone   no  matter  what age . We  need  a  srong  deterant in  this  country

rejection.details: There are other similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=knife+crime&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=tough+knife&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
